channel.name: channel
channel.description: Move all members in a specified voice channel.
channel.error: Please connect to a voice channel before executing this command.

excludeMii.name: exclude-mii-fighters
excludeMii.description: Exclude Mii Brawler, Mii Swordfighter, and Mii Gunner

moves.name: moves
moves.description: Move multiple specified users to a voice channel.
moves.error: The specified users are not connected to a voice channel.

teams.name: teams
teams.description: Divide into teams and move to voice channels.

exclude.name: exclude-member
exclude.description: Member to exclude from team division

teams.errorChannel: Please connect to a voice channel before executing this command.
teams.errorPeople: At least 2 people are required for team division.
